name: Spooky Scuffle
description:
In Spooky Scuffle, you play as a vampire trying to get home to their castle. Slash the enemies with your swords, avoid their attacks, transform into a bat and suck their blood to regain health! 

But.. beware the sun! 

Always stay in the shadows if you don't want to get burnt to a crisp...

Menus: Mouse 

In-Game: Controller

Game Designers: 

Jérémy BECICA

Alice DOUSSIN

Guillaume FOSSIER

Lisa JAUGEY

Game Programmers:

Antony GAVELLE

Théo RITOUNI
